content: पेशिः --शी {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} A piece of flesh. {@--2@} A ball or mass of flesh. {@--3@} An egg. {@--4@} A muscle; <ls>Y. 3. 100.</ls> {@--5@} The fœtus shortly after conception. {@--6@} A bud on the point of blowing. {@--7@} The thunderbolt of Indra (said to be {%<ab>m.</ab>%} also). {@--8@} A kind of musical instrument. {@--9@} The shell or rind (of fruits). {@--10@} A sheath, scabbard. {@--11@} A shoe.
